entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
